question: Where are the headquarters of World Boxing Council?
explanation: World Boxing Council was formed in 1963 and is one of the four major organizations which sanction world championship boxing bouts. It was established by 11 countries upon invitation of President of Mexico to form an international organization to unify all commissions of the world to control the expansion of boxing. Its headquarters are in Mexico City. How many nations were there for the establishment of World Boxing Council at Mexico?
